OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params._validEventId: Zupass event UUID converted to bigint

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._data: The ABI-encoded tokenId as a uint256.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._maci: The MACI contract interface to be stored

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

maci().notice: the reference to the MACI contract

register(address,bytes).notice: Registers the user if they own the token with the token ID encoded in _data. Throws if the user does not own the token or if the token has already been used to sign up.

registeredTickets(uint256).notice: a mapping of ticket IDs to whether they have been used

setMaciInstance(address).notice: Adds an uninitialised MACI instance to allow for token signups

userdoc.notice: This contract allows to gatekeep MACI signups by requiring new voters to own a certain ERC721 token
